segue_the_chain: Sadness will pass, so to This Too Shall Pass…

segue_dave.line: Enigma have made House music, and one kind of House music is garage house. Let's hear a garage house track...
segue_dave.explanation: Enigma have made music identifiable with the musical genre: House music, while House music is an ancestor of garage house, the musical genre to which the next track belongs
